answers.answer: I have been experiencing frequent pain right under my left breast, where the bottom of your bra sits.  When I told my doctor almost 2 years ago, she said I must have banged it on something???  When I told her I did not bang it on anything, she said well there are no main organs there so nothing to worry about.  Well, I mentioned it a couple more times over the next few months and it was brushed off each time.  There was one night in particular when it was extremely painful for about 1 minute, then it went away.  Other than that time, it is more of an ache, not really painful, but just doesn't feel normal, makes me think something is definately going on.  I am going to see my doctor again in 2 weeks and will insist on some tests.  Anyone else have this problem, and if so, what was the result?  Thanks for your time.

question: I have pain under my left breast and above the ribs.  The pain is sometimes after eating and mostly after walking or exersise.  CT scan showed only an enlarged liver for which there seems no treatment.  There is a small node to the right of where the pain originates.  I have to have a bowel movement almost immediately after eating a meal and there is also pain after the meal in the exact same place.  Pain starts in front but radiates around the side to the back.  I am very overweight with a protruding stomach and no diet seems to work.  I also have type two diabetes and high cholesterol and trigliserides.  I take meds for all these conditions.  Anyone have all these symptoms?
title: Upper left quadrant pain under breast above ribs
